parameters.name: numtrials
parameters.description: Number of trials to test. Times will be equally spaced between min and max, and randomized

parameters.name: trialtime
parameters.description: Trial time, in seconds, for each test.

parameters.name: keytouse
parameters.description: Key to use to make response. Could be " " for spacebar, "<lshift>" for shift, or a letter name (upperaces)

parameters.name: nameofkeytouse
parameters.description: Name of key to use, that appears in on-screen instructions.

parameters.name: mintaptime
parameters.description: Minimum tapping time to use (shoud not be less than around 180 ms, which is about the fastest someone can reasonably tap on a computer keyboard.

parameters.name: trainingflashes
parameters.description: Number of training flashes to use for entrainment
